profile: I senior researcher (equivalent of full professor) at the National Institute of Astrophysics, Optics and Electronics, (INAOE), previously I worked at the Graduate Program in Systems Engineering (PISIS) in Universidad Autónoma de Nuevo León. I received the B. S. degree from the Universidad Autónoma de Puebla in 2004. I obtained the Ph.D. and M. S. degrees from INAOE in 2010 and 2006, respectively. I am member of Sistema Nacional de Investigadores (SNI) since 2011, currently level 2. Member of the Mexican Academy of Sciences, the board of directors of ChaLearn and chair of TC 12 the IAPR.
